annotations.description: The Gin-Gin Mule was created by bartender Audrey Saunders when she was working at the NYC Bar Beacon around 2000. This drink is an important one for a few di...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Gin-Gin Mule

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Gin
1oz (30ml) Simple Syrup
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
6-8 Mint Leaves 
Top Ginger Beer
Mint Sprig Garnish

Shake ingredients. Strain into large glass with ice. 
Top with roughly an ounce of ginger beer. 
Garnish with mint sprig

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CtzaTXYoRn4
title: Gin-Gin Mule
